Author: tornessa
Text: Good to know other people in the group will probably be working or in school too! And thank you! Super nervous and feeling like I failed at outpatient (therapist/nutritionist). But hoping to make a ton of progress soon.

Author: thekroganrebellions
Text: I did an internship and IOP at the same time. I found it pretty draining but mostly because recovery is hard work. From my experience, most people in IOP are either working or are students, so your treatment team should be able to work with you. Good luck friend! I'm proud of you! <3
